content: That's really helpful! I can see how Jira's boards, backlogs, and sprints work together to facilitate Agile project management. Since I learned about Scrum framework at the 3-day project management workshop last month, I think I can leverage Jira's features to implement Scrum in my project. Can you tell me more about how to create a Scrum board in Jira and configure it for my project?
